description: Articles and videos from The NY Times on credit scores, credit reports and credit ratings, including information on how to improve credit scores, the definition of a FICO, or Fair Isaac Corporation score, applying for credit reports from Experian, TransUnion and Equifax, and how credit scores affect mortgage or credit card interest rates.
title: Credit Scores
title_page: Credit Scores - The New York Times
text: Because of the economic turmoil, consumers are having an increasingly hard time getting loans. How lenders view your creditworthiness is critical to determining how you live your life. Luckily, your credit score is something you can control. It's a good idea to focus on improving it, and this section provides advice on how to do that.
